parameters.append:
When the new video is connected to the DOM, whether to use the native appendChild method to add a child DOM:
                        true: Add a child DOM. The new video can be played together with the original video.
                        false: (Default) Do not add a child DOM. Only play the new video.

parameters.mirror:
Whether to enable mirror mode when rendering video:
                            true: Enable mirror mode.
                            false: (Default) Do not enable mirror mode.
